experience.title: Marketing And Business Development
experience.description: -coordinated with 23 hub heads across india to create a cross learning platform to increase overall efficiency of transformation.-Reached out to corporate for business dealing for negotiating corporate renting which benefited both parties.-initiated negotiations with various hotel owners for their overtaking resulting in the expansion of oyo properties in bangalore.-created marketing strategies for highly effective publicity by negotiating incentive-based recommendations of oyo with taxi unions.
